snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Burn After Reading
snippet.description: Quirky, violent Coen comedy isn't meant for kids.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Burn After Reading
snippet.description: Quirky, violent Coen comedy isn't meant for kids.

snippet.title: Game Review: Star Wars: Jedi Reading
snippet.description: Reading lessons that may be too violent for younger kids.

snippet.title: Book Review: After Tupac and D Foster
snippet.description: Three girls grow up together in the inner city.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Mia Reading: The Bugaboo Bugs
snippet.description: Mouse teaches reading in beautiful computer game.

snippet.title: Book Review: Born to Read
snippet.description: A perfect story for burgeoning bookworms.

snippet.title: Book Review: After the Wreck, I Picked Myself Up, Spread My Wings, and Flew Away
snippet.description: Raw look at loss & addiction best for older teens.

snippet.title: Life After Potter -- and More Great Summer Reading
snippet.description: Discover what great reads are out there and that there's literary life after Harry Potter.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: The Informant!
snippet.description: Playful tale of corporate misdeeds may interest some teens.

snippet.title: DVD Review: Novocaine
snippet.description: This dark, stylish tale isn't for kids.
